post:
Hey vpsBoard,
 
Ready2Frag is excited to come to you today with great new VPS deals! We're a registered business, operating under a DBA of HostVenom, LLC, and have been in operation for just shy of one year.
 
Ready2Frag is a game server provider that offers a wide range of services. Our KVM VPSs are based on modern hardware, with Xeon E3 processors, RAID-10 SSDs, and a 1Gbps Network Port.
 
We include the following with all of our VPS services:

  • Premium Chicago, IL Data Center: Steadfast Networks 725 S. Wells
  • Free DDoS Protection: Up to 4Gbps/4MPPS.
  • Steadfast ASN/Blend: AS32748
  • InterNAP FCP Route Optimization: [More Info]
  • * Limited Time: FREE Double Bandwidth!
  • 24/7/365 Support

FAQ

Q: Do you have a network speed test or test IP?

A: Please open a ticket to get access to a test IP and speed tests on our network.

Q: What payment processors do you use?

A: We accept payments via PayPal, Stripe, and Coinbase (Bitcoin).

Q: What do you allow on your VPS services?

A: Please see our Acceptable Usage Policy for more information.

Q: Do you have discounts for longer payment periods?

A: We allow up to 3-month pre-pay for VPS services. With this deal, you get an additional 5% off.
